jobDescription:
Title: Software Engineer

Duration: 12 month contract

Responsibilities:

Develop microservices using Java, Spring Boot, Angular, or other programming languages, adhering to industry best practices and The Company's coding standards.
Develop and execute unit, component and integration tests, using Cypress and/or Cucumber, to verify the engineering work meets requirements
Document design decisions, design patterns, and implementation details related to the engineering work
Software development adhering to SDLC including requirements discovery, design, verification, product delivery and maintenance
Execution of manual test procedures
Troubleshooting of failed tests or other software bugs
Participates in Agile ceremonies as a member of a scrum team
